statements: SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, region FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT location_name, longitude FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE latitude <= 40.7128;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT location_id, location_name, region FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude), COUNT(*) FROM locations WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT landmark_name, description FROM landmarks WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 35;
SELECT l.landmark_name, l.description, loc.location_name FROM landmarks l JOIN locations loc ON l.location_id = loc.location_id;
SELECT l.landmark_name, loc.location_name FROM landmarks l JOIN locations loc ON l.location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE description LIKE '%historical%' ORDER BY landmark_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM landmarks WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM terrain_info ORDER BY elevation ASC;
SELECT id, name, elevation FROM terrain_info WHERE difficulty_level = 'Moderate';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT l.name AS landmark_name, t.terrain_type, t.difficulty_level FROM landmarks l JOIN terrain_info t ON l.id = t.id;
SELECT name, elevation FROM locations WHERE elevation BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT l.name AS landmark_name, t.difficulty_level FROM landmarks l JOIN terrain_info t ON l.id = t.id WHERE t.difficulty_level = 'Moderate';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM landmarks WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT landmark_id, name, description FROM landmarks WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT route_name, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM travel_routes WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.123456 AND longitude < -74.987654;
SELECT * FROM landmarks INNER JOIN locations ON landmarks.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM travel_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM landmarks WHERE description LIKE '%beautiful%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT terrain_type, elevation FROM terrain_information WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, age FROM adventure_travelers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT route_name, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM travel_routes WHERE start_location_id != end_location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT landmark_name, location_name FROM landmarks INNER JOIN locations ON landmarks.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE landmark_name LIKE '%valley%';
SELECT terrain_type, elevation FROM terrain_information WHERE elevation > 1000 ORDER BY elevation DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM travel_routes WHERE start_location_id = 3 OR end_location_id = 5;
SELECT traveler_name, age FROM adventure_travelers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC, traveler_name DESC;
